boardgame.name: A House Divided
A House Divided: War Between the States 1861-65
Una nación dividida
Norden _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Süden
North _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; South
boardgame.description: from Mayfair Games website:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A House Divided simulates the epic struggle of the American Civil War that was fought over the twin issues of slavery and state's rights. The period from 1840 to 1861 saw these issues brought to a boil, and in 1861 the nation became tangled in a terrible war that lasted four long years._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game depicts the war between North and South from the First Battle of Bull Run (or Manassas Junction) to Lee's surrender at Appomattox Courthouse _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; or Grant's surrender at Harrisburg... Each player leads one of these two nations and makes the strategic decisions which determine the outcome of the war._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game board represents the United States, north and south and from the Atlantic coast to just west of the Mississippi. [...] The play map contains a number of boxes, each representing a city, town or locations important to the war. These boxes are connected by transportation lines _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; blue for rivers, tan for roads and black for railroads _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; which provide the paths to victory or defeat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Can you keep the Union whole or force the separation of the United States?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 1981 Charles S. Roberts Best Pre-Twentieth Century Game Nominee
1981 Charles S. Roberts Best Pre-Twentieth Century Game Winner
1989 Charles S. Roberts Best Pre-World War II Board Game Nominee

Phalanx english edition still in shrinkwrap. Shipping at actual cost dependend on destination, total weight and method of shipment chosen. Usually shipping a single (regular sized) boardgame (surface) costs 12.90€ worldwide and 8.60€ within Europe. Smaller games ship cheaper. Of course multiple games can be combined.

PHALANX GERMAN (you just need the english rules) VERSION DISCOUNT RULES: IF YOU BUY 3 OR MORE GAMES YOU´LL GET DISCOUNT. THE PERCENTAGE IS (DAY+MONTH)/2 (Example: If you buy the games on 12th June you´ll get 12+6=18/2=9 %). So you can get a max. Discount on 31th december of 21 % :_). The date is the BGG-TIME (CST). I´m selling a lot of other german boardgames Shipping worldwide (Paypal or cash or Western Union). Bank Transfer is also OK, if there are no further costs for me. Picture for condition purposes can me mailed Look also at my other games I want _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;to get rid off_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; If you are looking for some other games send me an email. Shipping costs are roughly: --------- up to 2 kg ----- up to 5 kg --- up to 10 kg --------- no insurance --- insurance ---- insurance Europe (EU) - 9 Euros ----- 17 Euros ----- 22 Euros USA/Canada - 13 Euros ----- 32 Euros ----- 42 Euros Japan ------ 13 Euros ----- 37 Euros ----- 52 Euros Australia -- 13 Euros ----- 37 Euros ----- 52 Euros If you have further questions on shipping costs send me a message !!! BUYERS FROM SOUTH KOREA !!! PLEASE BUY FROM MY FRIEND ROBBIROB !!! I DON`T SELL GAMES TO SOUTH KOREA ANY MORE !!!

BRANDNEW: I´m offering the German Phalanx edition of this classic. Completely language independant! ********************************************** 100% mint condition (still shrinkwrapped!). Factory new...!! ********************************************** All games come from a private collection (non-smoking and pet-free environment)! CONDITION: Brand new, in original shrinkwrap. GDW 2nd Edition - see photo POSTAGE COST: UK postage: £3.50 European Postage: £5.50 Rest of World Postage: £10.00 Any buyers in and around London are welcome to collect in person (cash on collection). COMBINED SHIPPING: I will always combine multiple items to reduce your shipping costs where possible. Please note that it is NOT always cheaper to combine shipping on games outside the UK due to the weight limit of 2KG on the Small Packet service. As a rough approximation, outside the UK it is usually cheaper to combine 5 or more games, while 4 or less are best sent individually. This depends entirely on the specific games - please contact me before buying if you wish to purchase multiple games so that I can give you an accurate shipping cost. ABOUT ME: I have been playing and collecting games for over 25 years and I also sell games and magazines on ebay with the same username (saabdastard) where I have a 100% positive rating and a feedback score of over 4000. I am a verified PAYPAL Premier account holder (since 2004), with over 650 PayPal Verified Buyers. SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Please wait until you receive my invoice before sending payment. Payment is due within 5 days of the date you receive my invoice. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: UK buyers may use PayPal, cheque or cash-on-collection. Overseas buyers MUST USE PAYPAL only. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs. Europe and Rest of World rates shown above are for Airmail. Surface Mail rate to Rest of World is available if you wish (same as Europe Air rate), but Surface Mail to Rest of World can take up to 2 months! There is no real difference between Air and Surface rates for Europe. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. Failure to take out optional insurance limits my liability for loss or damage in the mail to the amount automatically covered by Royal Mail (currently £36 per package for Small Packets, £150 for International Standard). CUSTOMS: Buyers outside the EU are responsible for all Customs charges applicable to their country. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange or refund within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization from me BEFORE returning the item.

POSTAGE COST: UK postage: £5.50 European Postage: £8.25 Rest of World Postage: £14.00 Any buyers in and around London are welcome to collect in person (cash on collection). COMBINED SHIPPING: I will always combine multiple items to reduce your shipping costs where possible. Please note that it is NOT always cheaper to combine shipping on games outside the UK due to the weight limit of 2KG on the Small Packet service. As a rough approximation, outside the UK it is usually cheaper to combine 5 or more games, while 4 or less are best sent individually. This depends entirely on the specific games - please contact me before buying if you wish to purchase multiple games so that I can give you an accurate shipping cost. ABOUT ME: I have been playing and collecting games for over 25 years and I also sell games and magazines on ebay with the same username (saabdastard) where I have a 100% positive rating and a feedback score of over 4000. I am a verified PAYPAL Premier account holder (since 2004), with over 650 PayPal Verified Buyers. SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Please wait until you receive my invoice before sending payment. Payment is due within 5 days of the date you receive my invoice. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: UK buyers may use PayPal, cheque or cash-on-collection. Overseas buyers MUST USE PAYPAL only. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs. Europe and Rest of World rates shown above are for Airmail. Surface Mail rate to Rest of World is available if you wish (same as Europe Air rate), but Surface Mail to Rest of World can take up to 2 months! There is no real difference between Air and Surface rates for Europe. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. Failure to take out optional insurance limits my liability for loss or damage in the mail to the amount automatically covered by Royal Mail (currently £39 per package for Small Packets, £150 for International Standard). CUSTOMS: Buyers outside the EU are responsible for all Customs charges applicable to their country. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange or refund within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization from me BEFORE returning the item.
